args.natural_language_statement: Let z ∈ ℂ. Show that for all n ∈ ℕ, |∑_{k=0}^n z^k/k! - e^z| ≤ |z|^{n+1}/(n+1)! * e^{|z|}. Translate this into Lean4 (Mathlib) code. End the statement with := by sorry. Use Finset.range for the sum and coerce factorial to ℂ with (k! : ℂ).

result:

args.content:
import Mathlib

theorem exp_series_tail_bound (z : Complex) (n : Nat) :
  Complex.abs (∑ k in Finset.range (n+1), z ^ k / (Nat.factorial k : Complex) - Complex.exp z)
    ≤ (Complex.abs z) ^ (n+1) / (Nat.factorial (n+1) : ℝ) * Real.exp (Complex.abs z) := by
  sorry

import Mathlib

open Complex

theorem exp_series_tail_bound (z : Complex) (n : Nat) :
  Complex.abs ((∑ k in Finset.range (n+1), z ^ k / (Nat.cast (Nat.factorial k) : Complex)) - Complex.exp z)
    ≤ (Complex.abs z) ^ (n+1) / (Nat.cast (Nat.factorial (n+1)) : ℝ) * Real.exp (Complex.abs z) := by
  sorry

import Mathlib

open Complex

theorem exp_series_tail_bound (z : Complex) (n : Nat) :
  Complex.abs ((∑ k in Finset.range (n+1), z ^ k / (Nat.factorial k : Complex)) - Complex.exp z)
    ≤ (Complex.abs z) ^ (n+1) / (Nat.factorial (n+1) : Real) * Real.exp (Complex.abs z) := by
  sorry

args.query: mathlib4 Complex abs notation Complex.abs Complex.norm Complex.abs mathlib4 'Complex.abs' 'Complex.norm'

args.content:
import Mathlib
open BigOperators

/-- For z ∈ ℂ and n ∈ ℕ, the tail of the exponential series is bounded by
    |∑_{k=0}^n z^k/k! - e^z| ≤ |z|^{n+1}/(n+1)! * e^{|z|}.
-/
theorem exp_series_tail_bound (z : ℂ) (n : Nat) :
  Complex.abs ((∑ k in Finset.range (n+1), z ^ k / (Nat.cast (Nat.factorial k) : ℂ)) - Complex.exp z)
    ≤ (Complex.abs z) ^ (n+1) / (Nat.cast (Nat.factorial (n+1)) : ℝ) * Real.exp (Complex.abs z) := by
  sorry

import Mathlib

open BigOperators

/-- For z ∈ ℂ and n ∈ ℕ, the tail of the exponential series is bounded by
    |∑_{k=0}^n z^k/k! - e^z| ≤ |z|^{n+1}/(n+1)! * e^{|z|}.
-/
theorem exp_series_tail_bound (z : Complex) (n : Nat) :
  Complex.abs ((∑ k in Finset.range (n+1), z ^ k / (Nat.factorial k : Complex)) - Complex.exp z)
    ≤ (Complex.abs z) ^ (n+1) / (Nat.factorial (n+1) : Real) * Real.exp (Complex.abs z) := by
  sorry

import Mathlib
open BigOperators

/-- For z ∈ ℂ and n ∈ ℕ, the tail of the exponential series is bounded by
    |∑_{k=0}^n z^k/k! - e^z| ≤ |z|^{n+1}/(n+1)! * e^{|z|}.
-/
theorem exp_series_tail_bound (z : Complex) (n : Nat) :
  Complex.abs ((∑ k in Finset.range (n+1), z ^ k / (Nat.factorial k : Complex)) - Complex.exp z)
    ≤ (Complex.abs z) ^ (n+1) / (Nat.factorial (n+1) : Real) * Real.exp (Complex.abs z) := by
  sorry

import Mathlib
open BigOperators

theorem exp_series_tail_bound (z : Complex) (n : Nat) :
  Complex.abs ((∑ k in Finset.range (n+1), z ^ k / (Nat.cast (Nat.factorial k) : Complex)) - Complex.exp z)
    ≤ (Complex.abs z) ^ (n+1) / (Nat.cast (Nat.factorial (n+1)) : Real) * Real.exp (Complex.abs z) := by
  sorry

import Mathlib

-- Bound on the tail of the exponential series in ℂ
theorem exp_series_tail_bound (z : Complex) (n : Nat) :
  Complex.abs ((∑ k in Finset.range (n+1), z ^ k / (Nat.cast (Nat.factorial k) : Complex)) - Complex.exp z)
    ≤ (Complex.abs z) ^ (n+1) / (Nat.cast (Nat.factorial (n+1)) : Real) * Real.exp (Complex.abs z) := by
  sorry

import Mathlib
open BigOperators

/-- For z ∈ ℂ and n ∈ ℕ, the tail of the exponential series is bounded by
    |∑_{k=0}^n z^k/k! - e^z| ≤ |z|^{n+1}/(n+1)! * e^{|z|}.
-/
theorem exp_series_tail_bound (z : ℂ) (n : Nat) :
  Complex.abs ((∑ k in Finset.range (n+1), z ^ k / (k! : ℂ)) - Complex.exp z)
    ≤ (Complex.abs z) ^ (n+1) / ((n+1)! : ℝ) * Real.exp (Complex.abs z) := by
  sorry
